name: Gates of Avalon
description: Explore a rich and varied environment as you quest, develop skills, make friends, and battle enemies all as you uncover the mystery of a dark and growing menace. Gates of Avalon is a first person action-RPG, the first module in the Avalon series, a Gates Game Adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: x86 processor, 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or higher Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: x86 processor, 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space
